SEARCH
Package org.hrw.backend.audit

Class PdfGenerator

java.lang.Object
org.hrw.backend.audit.PdfGenerator
public class PdfGenerator extends Object
Generates an audit report as pdf for a given set of ServerRecord data and an AuditSummary.

The generated report contains:

  1. Title section
  2. Metadata (report ID, tool version, time range)
  3. Audit context (data source, filters, number of records)
  4. Integrity check result (success / failure)
  5. Short textual summary

PDF creation is implemented using Apache PDFBox and returned as a byte array suitable for download or storage.

  • Method Details

    • generateReport

      public byte[] generateReport(List<org.hrw.datamodels.ServerRecord> data, AuditSummary summary) throws IOException
      Generates a complete audit report as a PDF document.

      The method determines the minimum and maximum timestamp from the given ServerRecord list, creates a single-page A4 PDF, writes the different report sections and returns the document as a byte array.

      Parameters:
      data - list of audited server records
      summary - summary metadata of the audit
      Returns:
      PDF file content as a byte array
      Throws:
      IOException - if PDF creation fails

    • formatUnixSeconds

      public String formatUnixSeconds(String unixSeconds)
      Converts a Unix timestamp (in seconds, as string) to a formatted date-time string using the configured formatter and the Europe/Berlin time zone.
      Parameters:
      unixSeconds - epoch seconds as string
      Returns:
      formatted date-time string
